errors.error_description: References a non-existent dependencies.txt file that is not mentioned elsewhere in the repository
correction_candidates: Check for requirements.txt file instead, which is the standard Python dependency file
Install dependencies manually as needed when running the viewer script
Look for a setup.py file to install dependencies using pip install -e .
Use pip freeze to generate your own requirements file from working environment
errors.golden_answer: Check for requirements.txt file instead, which is the standard Python dependency file

errors.error_description: Unclear instructions that don't specify how to actually install dependencies from the referenced file
correction_candidates: Run pip install -r requirements.txt to install dependencies from the file
Use conda env create -f environment.yml if using conda package manager
Install each dependency individually using pip install package_name
Follow the installation instructions provided in the dependency file itself
errors.golden_answer: Run pip install -r requirements.txt to install dependencies from the file
